attributes.action: Give a portion of Vaccine supply to India
attributes.additional_details: By giving the Vaccines to local governments and communities the UK government can help to save lives. we can help prevent the worsening of the situation in a country with hundreds of thousands of cases and thousands of deaths a day, with many remaining unreported, we can help save lives, please hand over a portion of our vaccine supply to the local government in India, or at least raise awareness for the issue.
attributes.background: the situation in India is dire, thousands are dying daily from COVID-19 if the international community does not intervene the situation will worsen, the UK government can help to save lives by giving a portion of their vaccine supply directly to Indian communities.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584152

Send excess equipment to countries in humanitarian covid crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584188

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

You may be interested to know that on 25 April the Government announced that it was sending medical equipment to India to support the country in its fight against COVID-19: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-sends-life-saving-medical-equipment-to-india
